评论概述: Very nice but sorely needs a drawstring!
类型: Size: X-LargeColor: 4 Light Green With Chain
评论详情: Decent quality for what you pay. The cut is pretty much straight so no real fit here. The straps are sadly not made from webbing but rather just plain ribbon. The ribbon is too thin for the buckles they loop through, so expect them to drop and to have to thread them back through the buckles often. The elastic waistband is nice, but it doesn't feel strong enough - I often feel these pants slowly sliding down. It's not super nice having to keep pulling them back up, but the lack of a drawstring is pretty much my only real complaint. It's so rare to find pants with a fun color and design like this!

loveeee these glad i went 2 sizes up i’m a 3x and i order a 5x for the baggie look definitely got a lot of room in the legs and the waist does have stretch but it actually fits so if your looking for that baggie look definitely order a size up or 2

评论概述: attractive, comfy, but watch out for the fragile chain!
评论详情: I really like these, and they fit as expected. The one issue is the quality of the chain included - it is very flimsy and snapped after a few wears, so I highly recommend replacing it with a sturdier product (and definitely at least remove it before washing/drying.) The pockets aren't fake either, so that also wins points with me.

评论详情: I’m normally a size 2x-3x, my struggle being I am bottom heavy and have pretty wide hips. I bought a 3x and they fit me but not in the desired style. They are stretchy so the hips were pretty tight not baggy at all, and the bottoms were looser but too short due to the stretching over the hips. The fabric is weird but I don’t might it much. Seems pretty breathable and comfy. I’m going to repurchase in a 4x or 5x because I think they are nice and will be cute when they are a little baggier. If you want the fitted look buy your exact size otherwise size up.

First off, I love the look. I got it to wear to an outdoor Janet Jackson concert. Getting the right fit was trial and error. I initially ordered a size large and it was way too tight in the waist and snug in the buttocks and thighs. I then ordered an xl and it fit in the waist, but it felt a little too snug on my thighs. Because I really loved the look, I ordered a size xxl. This was a perfect fit in my buttocks and thigh area, however the waist was quite loose. I spent the night continually pulling my pants up. Another negative is that the chain broke and I had to fix it. Despite my issues, I wore it to the concert and received so many compliments on my outfit. By the way, my top, bralet, and shoes were also purchased on Amazon.
